t: Edward & Sons® Organic Unsalted Plain Brown Rice Snaps
s: In 1978, Edward & Sons introduced the first Brown Rice Snaps®. Oven baked instead of fried, they pioneered a new generation of healthy, whole grain snacking. Organic Unsalted Plain Brown Rice Snaps® are baked with 100% whole grain brown jasmine rice and contain no added oils or preservatives.
